comment._content: This is 'Temple of Dendur' now at Metropolitan Museum: www.joanlansberry.com/met-muzm/dendur.html This slide has been flipped, for you can see more clearly here: www.joanlansberry.com/met-muzm/dendur11-l.jpg Goddess is on left...
